mapper.select: select c.id, c.owner_id, c. club_name, c.introduce, c.member_num, c.created_at, u.nick_name from clubs c join users u on c.owner_id = u.id where c.deleted = false
select deleted from user_club where user_id = #{0} and club_id = #{1}
select c.* from clubs c join user_club uc on c.id = uc.club_id where c.deleted = false and uc.deleted = false and uc.user_id = #{0}
mapper.update: update clubs set member_num = member_num+1, updated_at = now() where id = #{clubid}
update clubs set club_name = #{club_name}, introduce = #{introduce}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id}
update clubs set deleted = true, updated_at = now() where id = #{id}
update user_club set deleted = false, updated_at = now() where user_id = #{0} and club_id = #{1}
